text: aur tum unako dekhoge ki dozakh ke saamane lae gaye hain (aur) zillat ke maare kate jaate hain (aur) kanakkhiyon se dekhe jaate hain aur momineen kahenge ki hakeeqat mein vahee bade ghaate mein hain jinhone qayaamat ke din apane aap ko aur apane ghar vaalon ko khasaare mein daala dekho zulm karane vaale daemee azaab mein rahenge
